fragment: Walter White transforms from a mild-mannered chemistry teacher to a ruthless drug lord known as Heisenberg.
Skyler White struggles to come to terms with her husband's criminal activities and tries to protect her family.
Jesse Pinkman is a small-time methamphetamine manufacturer and dealer who becomes deeply involved in the drug trade.
Hank Schrader is a DEA agent and Walter White's brother-in-law who becomes obsessed with uncovering the identity of the mysterious drug lord Heisenberg.
Marie Schrader is Hank Schrader's wife and Skyler White's sister, known for her kleptomania and obsession with the color purple.
